title: TimelineCell
description: Provide concise key information about timeline objects. These may be tappable to drill down into full details.

Visible.description: Only valid for static section, will be ignored in dynamic sections.

Subhead.description: On mobile, it will be ignored when state is Start / End.

Attribute.description: On mobile, it will be ignored when state is Start / End.

Timestamp.description: The date time for the cell.

State.description: An icon and a label showing the status of the timeline object.

enum.description: The timeline item is a start node.
The timeline item is a end node.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the image is pressed. On mobile, it will be ignored when state is Start / End.
